value:
$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|When I was summoned to Askr, there
were only a few students and house
leaders here.$k$pNow, the number of those affiliated
with the Officers Academy and the
monastery has grown considerably.$k$p$WmMPID_レア,ch17_37_Rare_F_Normal,Face|I was surprised by that, myself. Many
students greet me as I walk through
the halls of the castle...$k$pBefore too long, I may catch myself
forgetting I'm in Askr and thinking
I'm back at the monastery!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Indeed. There are many from Fódlan
among those who lend their aid to
the Order of Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Normal,Face|There are even other Sylvains here
who come from a different Fódlan
than mine, yeah?$k$pHave to admit, it kind of surprised me
when someone asked why I wasn't
wearing my swimsuit earlier...$k$p$WmMPID_フェリクス,ch17_14_Felix_M_Normal,Face|I was asked something similar. I could
care less about the style choices of
some other version of me...$k$pBut fielding all these questions is
honestly becoming annoying.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Weapon01,Face|I saw a version of myself from two
years ago summoned, donning the
uniform of the Officers Academy.$k$p$WmMPID_レア,ch17_37_Rare_F_Normal,Face|So your Fódlan must be two years
ahead of ours in time.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Weapon01,Face|Yes. It seems the time in Fódlan I was
summoned from is some time after
when you three were summoned.$k$p$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|Coming back to my original point...$k$pNot only are there students here in
Askr, but Manuela and Aelfric as well,
both in a position to guide them.$k$pI have also seen Catherine of the
Knights of Seiros and Shamir.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|The Gatekeeper—not to mention the
doggies and kitties that came along
with him—is doing great too!$k$p$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|If there are this many from Garreg
Mach Monastery here in Askr...$k$pIt may be possible to establish a
second monastery in this land as well.$k$p$WmMPID_レア,ch17_37_Rare_F_Normal,Face|A second Garreg Mach Monastery?$k$pIf the purpose of such an undertaking
was to support the students and not
to preach the teachings of Seiros...$k$pWhat say you, Prince Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|If we can provide support in any way,
don't hesitate to ask. We are glad to
be of service.$k$p$WmMPID_レア,ch17_37_Rare_F_Normal,Face|Thank you, Prince Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Weapon01,Face|If we're to establish a second Garreg
Mach Monastery...$k$pSurely it would make sense for an
Officers Academy to stand alongside
it, wouldn't it?$k$p
